item.title: Trump admin live updates: DHS to pay immigrants in US illegally $1K to self deport
item.description: Self deporting has been something the Trump Administration has been pushing.

item.title: Sean 'Diddy' Combs trial gets underway with jury selection
item.description: Jury selection starts Monday in the sex trafficking trial of Sean "Diddy" Combs.

item.title: Boat washes ashore with 3 dead, 9 unaccounted for, 4 survivors
item.description: Three dead bodies and four survivors in need of medical care were discovered on a boat that washed ashore near San Diego on Monday morning.

item.title: Catholic community reacts to Trump's fake image of himself as pope
item.description: President Donald Trump posted an AI-generated image of himself dressed as the pope. The post has since received criticism from some members of the Cat...
